channel.title: Gigs on DJ Lorenzo
channel.description: Recent content in Gigs on DJ Lorenzo

item.title: The Fundamental Styles of Tango with Ignacio Varchausky
item.description: Do not miss the seminar with Ignacio Varchausky Friday May 25 at Kavakava Tango!!! Ignacio is well known as member of Orquesta El Arranque, and for his work on transmitting knowledge of tango music to the new generation of tango musicians through Orquesta Escuela de Tango and TangoVia. He just released the book The Bass in Tango in the series “Método de tango”. Transmitting tango knowledge to a wider audience is of great importance to Ignacio, and he has a weekly radio show at the Buenos Aires tango radio La 2x4.

item.title: Tromsø Tango Meeting
item.description: I’m looking forward to djing the Midnight Milonga Sunday May 21 at Tromsø Tango Meeting. Naturally, there is also a Facebook event. Join me at the northernmost tango event in the world in exotic Tromsø!

item.title: DJing Friday Milonga
item.description: Welcome to the traditional Friday Milonga 2017-02-17 @ Trondheim Tangoklubb!

item.title: Milonga Hi-Fi
item.description: Welcome to a new stereophonic sound spectacular! For this special night the dj will let all the old 78s rest and play high fidelity recordings only! Nice, acoustic tango, milonga and vals for dancing as always, but recordings from approximately 1970 up until today. Save the date and join in on the fun! Maja will be your host this sparkling evening. Bring your own bubbles! Facebook event here. Photo: “Philco Stereophonic High Fidelity, 1960“ (CC BY-NC 2.

item.title: This Friday!
item.description: Don’t miss the first Friday Night Milonga of 2017! 2100-0100 Hs @ Trondheim tangoklubb 2017-01-06. Facebook event

item.title: Other activities 2016
item.description: While I was too busy to keep this page up to date, I was also djing 2016-11-18, 2016-09-23 and 2016-08-26. I also did a DJ seminar for future local tango DJs in three installations, the first in August, the second in September and the final one in November.

item.title: Last Friday Milonga of 2016
item.description: The last Friday Night Milonga is coming up 2016-12-16, starting at 21Hs and probably until around 01Hs. Welcome! (Facebook event)

item.title: Extraordinary Milonga on Friday June 24
item.description: Did you miss the final milonga last week? AFTER milonga to the rescue! With the best of tango, milonga and vals and Chacarera DOBLE! Including short chacarera intro at 9PM Sharp. https://www.facebook.com/events/526545067546192/

item.title: Next Gig: March 11
item.description: Next up is Friday March 11 @ Bridgehuset. ¡Nos vemos!

item.title: Next up: January 8
item.description: DJing first milonga of the year for Trondheim Tangoklubb Friday January 8: 21:00 at Bridgehuset.

item.title: Festejamos el día del tango
item.description: Extraordinary milonga at Bridgehuset tonight at 9 PM, celebrating the day of tango. Facebook-event

item.title: Upcoming Gigs Fall 2014
item.description: 2014-08-29 First Milonga of Semester at Bridgehuset (OK, this has already been, stepped in on short notice) 2014-09-20 DJing the Grand Milonga in the marvellous ballroom of Hotel Britannia during the weekend with Maria Plazaola in Trondheim 2014-11-07 Regular Friday Milonga at Bridgehuset 2014-12-12 End of Semester Milonga at Bridgehuset Regular milongas at Bridgehuset all start at 21:00.

item.title: Upcoming Gigs 2013
item.description: I’m back: October 4, 2013 (that’s tomorrow!) November 15, 2013 December 13, 2013 All milongas @ Bridgehuset

item.title: Last chance for a while: Nov 18
item.description: I’m DJing the Friday night milonga @ Bridgehuset. This will be the last chance to dance to my music selection for quite a while, see you there!

item.title: Upcoming Gigs
item.description: Save the dates: September 9, 2011 October 7, 2011 November 18, 2011 All milongas @ Bridgehuset

item.title: Roxana & Sebastián May 20-22
item.description: [youtube http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETF-fQdid4A?wmode=transparent] Not to be missed: Roxana Suarez and Sebastián Achaval May 20-22. Yours truly will dj Friday night.
